blocks.content: In this milestone, you install Grafana Alloy on your selected platform. Grafana Alloy collects MySQL metrics and forwards them to Grafana Cloud for monitoring and visualization.
In the **Install Alloy** section, click **Run Grafana Alloy**.
You must either use an existing token or create a new one. The token safeguards against unauthorized access, ensuring that only you can install Alloy on your machine.
Click **Create new token** (or **Use an existing token** if you have one).
Verify that the **Enable Remote Configuration** toggle is set to on.
In the **Install and run Grafana Alloy** section, click **Copy to Clipboard**.

Log into the machine where you are installing Grafana Alloy, open the Terminal, and paste the contents of the clipboard. Press **Enter** to install Grafana Alloy. When the installation is complete, you'll see `Alloy is now running!`
Click **Test Alloy connection** to verify that Grafana Alloy is installed correctly.
If Grafana Alloy is installed correctly, you'll see `Awesome! Grafana Alloy is good to go`.
Click **Proceed to install integration** to continue.
